cause.description:
The Popular Front for the Liberation of Penguins, PFLP, is dedicated to, by all means necessary, rid the business community of it's dependence on shoddy software from Redmond.
1. Steve Ballmer must do the developer dance on CNN, naked.
2. Bill Gates must take one stroke of the cane for each undocumented Windows error message
3. The core contents of the EULA must be made readily available to the public in an understandable format.
cause.mission: Rid the world of Microsoft business products
cause.name: Popular Front for the Liberation of Penguins
